data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 96,000 people living in Namsai, Arunachal Pradesh, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Namsai, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Namsai.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Namsai to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Namsai.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Chepang people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Chepang people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Chepang people is yours.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Namsai.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Namsai.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,056 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

location.name: Namsai
location.people_groups_list: Chhetri, Dakpa, Puroik, Tai Darai, Khampti
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chhetri (247,000), Dakpa (100), Puroik (500), Tai Darai (400), Khampti (17,000)
